attributes.action: i want to get a lot of signatures so the government can send books and pens
attributes.additional_details: fly some resources and raise awareness about this issue
attributes.background: they can send them a lot of resources to help gambian girls and boys have a oppourtunity to beocome succesfull

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about helping children in Gambia, however it is not clear what you would like the UK Government to do.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to provide foreign aid to Gambia, if that is something you'd like to happen.
